input_text.Prompt:
Given a item title and item features, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Item title:
Chapin Industrial 3-Gallon Viton Cleaner/Degreaser Sprayer 2236

Item features:
Cleaner/degreaser sprayer designed for tougher spraying applications
Adjustable poly cone nozzle sprays coarse stream to a fine mist
SealTite acid and chemical-resistant seals and gaskets
Wide opening design for easy filling and cleaning
Lock-off feature prevents accidental discharge
3-gallon poly viton tank

Product description:
input_text.Response A: The Chapin Industrial 3-Gallon Viton Cleaner/Degreaser Sprayer is the perfect tool for tougher spraying applications. With its adjustable poly cone nozzle, you can spray a coarse stream to a fine mist for a variety of tasks. The sealTite acid and chemical-resistant seals and gaskets ensure that the sprayer is durable and leak-proof. The wide opening design allows for easy filling and cleaning, while the lock-off feature prevents accidental discharge. This sprayer is the perfect tool for cleaning and degreasing a variety of surfaces.
input_text.Response B: This Chapin Industrial cleaner/degreaser sprayer is designed for tougher spraying applications. The adjustable poly cone nozzle sprays a coarse stream to a fine mist. The wide opening design makes it easy to fill and clean. The lock-off feature prevents accidental discharge. It has a 3-gallon poly viton tank. The seals and gaskets are made of SealTite acid and chemical-resistant material.
